name: SEER Mets
title: SEER Mets
notes: **Note 1:** The term "skip metastasis" is not used with a consistent meaning in the literature.  In some cases, it refers to discontinuous metastasis in the same bone as the primary tumor, while in other cases it refers to discontinuous metastasis in an adjacent bone, usually in the same limb.
